Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi nke Lagos State bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị steeti, nke a na-ahụ maka ịhazi ma tinye n'ọrụ iwu steeti gbasara Nchịkwa Gburugburu ebe obibi.
Alhaji Lateef Jakande, onye mbụ a họpụtara dika Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti, wepụtara Ministrị nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi site na Ministrị Ọrụ na Njem nke oge ahụ

Ministry of Environment and Physical Planning jikọtara ya na Ministry of Physical Plan iji ghọọ Ministry of Environment na Physical Plaanning. Onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, kewara Ọfịs nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Atụmatụ Ahụike na 2003 wee kwalite ọfịs nke gburugburu ebe obibi ka ọ bụrụ Ministri.
Ebumnuche kachasị mkpa nke Ministrị ahụ bụ iwulite gburugburu ebe obibi dị ọcha, nke dị mma, na nke na-adịgide adịgide nke ga-akwalite njem nleta, uto akụ na ụba, na ọdịmma ụmụ amaala.
Maazị Tunji Bello ṅụrụ iyi dị ka Kọmishọna nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi nke Lagos n'ihu Gọvanọ Babajide Olusola Sanwo-Olu n'Ọgọst 20, 2019.
Gọọmentị steeti Lagos n'okpuru nchịkwa nke Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu ewepụtala "Citi Monitor," ngwá ọrụ n'ịntanetị maka ịchọpụta na ịkọ akụkọ niile gbasara mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi.
N'oge ọchịchị nke Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, e kewapụrụ ọfịs nke gburugburu ebe obibi na atụmatụ anụ ahụ ma melite ọfịs dị ugbu a nke gburugburu ebe dị ka Ministri
N'afọ 2005, e mepụtara ọfịs abụọ n'okpuru Ministry ya bụ: Office of Environmental Services (OES) na Office of Drainage Services (ODS)
N'afọ 2015, na-agbaso iwu nke Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti, Maazị Akinwunmi Ambode, e jikọtara ọfịs abụọ nke bụ OES na ODS n'ime otu Ministry nke bụ Ministry of Environment
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2018, e wepụrụ Ọfịs Ọrụ Mmiri Mmiri site na Ministry of Environment gaa na Lagos State Public Works Corporation (LSPWC) nke dị n'okpuru Ministry of Works
Mgbanwe a na Ministry of Environment bụ n'oge ọchịchị Akinwunmi Ambode
